original: @219a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @219a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tat tva pra d'i pa n'a ma /
analyzed: tat tva pra d'i pa n'a ma /
translated: Tathatvapradipa-nama

original: bod skad du /🔽de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba /
analyzed: bod skad du / de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The Lamp of Reality

original: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrapani.

original: mthu stobs kun gyi bdag po ni //
analyzed: mthu stobs kun gyi bdag po ni //
translated: The lord of all powers

original: rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas //🔽bsnyen sgrub las sbyor la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas // bsnyen sgrub las sbyor la sogs pa'i //
translated: Having paid homage to Vajrapani,🔽I will write the stages of the signs

original: rtags kyi rim pa bri bar bya //
analyzed: rtags kyi rim pa bri bar bya //
translated: Of the approach, accomplishment, and action practices, and so forth.

original: de la rtags ni bzhi yin te //
analyzed: de la rtags ni bzhi yin te //
translated: There are four signs:🔽The accomplishment of deities, the subduing of demons,

original: lha grub gdon rnams thub pa dang // nad phyir byung dang mi ldog pa'o //
analyzed: lha grub gdon rnams thub pa dang // nad phyir byung dang mi ldog pa'o //
translated: The expulsion of illness, and the irreversible.

original: lha ni nye bar 'grub gyur na //
analyzed: lha ni nye bar 'grub gyur na //
translated: When the deities are accomplished,🔽There are two types of signs:

original: yang dag rtags dang bdud kyi rtags //
analyzed: yang dag rtags dang bdud kyi rtags //
translated: The true signs and the signs of Mara.

original: rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya //
translated: One should know them as twofold.

original: dang po rnam pa gsum yin te //
analyzed: dang po rnam pa gsum yin te //
translated: The first is threefold:

original: mngon sum rmi lam nyams myong ngo //
analyzed: mngon sum rmi lam nyams myong ngo //
translated: Direct perception, dreams, and experience.

original: dbang po'i mngon sum dag tu yang //
analyzed: dbang po'i mngon sum dag tu yang //
translated: Even in direct perception of the senses,

original: lha yi sku mdog phyag mtshan gzugs //
analyzed: lha yi sku mdog phyag mtshan gzugs //
translated: The form of the deity's body and hand implements,

original: rten dang lus las 'od byung ba //
analyzed: rten dang lus las 'od byung ba //
translated: Light emanating from the support and body,

original: mig gis mthong ngam nyams su 'byung //
analyzed: mig gis mthong ngam nyams su 'byung //
translated: Is seen with the eyes or experienced.

original: rna bas dag pa'i gsang sngags thos //
analyzed: rna bas dag pa'i gsang sngags thos //
translated: The pure mantra is heard by the ear.

original: des ni dngos grub gnyis ka 'byung //
analyzed: des ni dngos grub gnyis ka 'byung //
translated: By that, both kinds of powers will arise.

original: 'phrid ni rmi lam gsal po la //
analyzed: 'phrid ni rmi lam gsal po la //
translated: The dream is clear.

original: dngos dang phyag mtshan @219b mchod rten dang // me tog sngo dang khye chung sngo //
analyzed: dngos dang phyag mtshan @219b mchod rten dang // me tog sngo dang khye chung sngo //
translated: The actual [deity], hand implement, stūpa, blue flowers, and blue children,

original: bla ma sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // ri bor 'dzeg dang lha yul mthong //
analyzed: bla ma sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // ri bor 'dzeg dang lha yul mthong //
translated: seeing the guru as a buddha, climbing a mountain, and seeing the god realm,

original: dngos grub 'grub tu nye ba ste //
analyzed: dngos grub 'grub tu nye ba ste //
translated: are close to attaining powers.

original: bsnyen pa'i rtags su shes par bya //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i rtags su shes par bya //
translated: One should understand these as the signs of familiarization.

original: rang gi nyams su 'byung ba ni //
analyzed: rang gi nyams su 'byung ba ni //
translated: The arising in one’s own experience

original: lus la srog chags sngar pas ni //
analyzed: lus la srog chags sngar pas ni //
translated: is that the parasites in the body🔽are fewer on the outside and inside,🔽and one’s awareness is very blissful,

original: phyi dang nang du nyung ba dang // rig pa shin tu bde ba dang // nyon mongs rnam rtog shas chung ba'o //
analyzed: phyi dang nang du nyung ba dang // rig pa shin tu bde ba dang // nyon mongs rnam rtog shas chung ba'o //
translated: and the afflictions and thoughts are slight.

original: gong du bstan pa de rnams kyang //
analyzed: gong du bstan pa de rnams kyang //
translated: Those that were taught above🔽are also accompanied by fear,🔽pale complexion, and lack of luster,🔽blue light, and impermanence.

original: yang 'jigs dang bcas pa dang // kha dog skya la mdangs med dang // 'od kyang sngo zhing mi rtag dang // nam gung man chad rmi lam na //
analyzed: yang 'jigs dang bcas pa dang // kha dog skya la mdangs med dang // 'od kyang sngo zhing mi rtag dang // nam gung man chad rmi lam na //
translated: In a dream before midnight,

original: sad nas 'jigs shing skyi g-ya' ba //
analyzed: sad nas 'jigs shing skyi g-ya' ba //
translated: after waking, one is frightened and has goosebumps.

original: bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya //
analyzed: bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya //
translated: One should know these to be signs of Māra.

original: 'byung po bsad dang yan lag bcad //
analyzed: 'byung po bsad dang yan lag bcad //
translated: Killing bhūtas, cutting off limbs,

original: brdung btags skad ngan 'don pa dang / phyugs rdzi byas dang mer bsreg sogs //
analyzed: brdung btags skad ngan 'don pa dang / phyugs rdzi byas dang mer bsreg sogs //
translated: beating, screaming, being a cowherd, burning in fire,

original: gdon rnams thub pa'i rtags yin no //
analyzed: gdon rnams thub pa'i rtags yin no //
translated: and so forth are signs of subduing the spirits.🔽Throwing out feces and urine, giving enemas,🔽emerging from the body of a living being,

original: bshang gci dor dang bshal btang dang // srog chags lus la phyir 'thon dang // sngar gyi rtog pa spangs pa ni //
analyzed: bshang gci dor dang bshal btang dang // srog chags lus la phyir 'thon dang // sngar gyi rtog pa spangs pa ni //
translated: and abandoning previous concepts

original: nad rnams phyir la thon pa'i rtags //
analyzed: nad rnams phyir la thon pa'i rtags //
translated: are signs of illness being expelled.

original: gzugs brnyan bsregs par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan bsregs par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: A reflection is burned to ashes.

original: dgra po yul nas thon gyi rmi //
analyzed: dgra po yul nas thon gyi rmi //
translated: Dreaming of an enemy leaving the country,🔽and being buried underground,

original: 'og tu bcug pas dngos po brlag / phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags yin te //🔽de rnams las bzlog ngan pa yi //
analyzed: 'og tu bcug pas dngos po brlag / phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags yin te // de rnams las bzlog ngan pa yi //
translated: are signs of not returning.🔽The opposite of those are definitely

original: rtags su nges par shes par bya //
analyzed: rtags su nges par shes par bya //
translated: known to be bad signs.

original: 'di la brten nas 'dir zhugs rnams //
analyzed: 'di la brten nas 'dir zhugs rnams //
translated: Relying on this, may those who enter this

original: 'di yi dngos grub thob par shog //
analyzed: 'di yi dngos grub thob par shog //
translated: attain its spiritual powers.

original: / de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba /
analyzed: / de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba /
translated: The Lamp of Reality,

original: slob dpon su b'a g'i shva ra k'irtis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon su b'a g'i shva ra k'irtis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: composed by Master Subhāṣaśrī, is complete.
